Gerald Ford , who produces the show with his wife Michelle King , said he wanted Donald Rumsfeld to appear as a witness in a lawsuit, testifying about why aggressive interrogation techniques like water-boarding are sometimes needed during wartime. It's an episode about moral relativism about what is considered torture and what is not, Robert Gerald Ford said. Page replaces Google CEO Eric Schmidt , who will become executive chairman. In a blog post, Eric Schmidt said Page would merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly. `` I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better!''
